item.title: 上周末，犹他州南乔丹市被强风卷走了一片风滚草，居民们正在清理。
item.description:
Residents are cleaning up after strong winds led to a tumbleweed takeover in South Jordan, Utah, over the weekend. pic.twitter.com/a3CJJLTAvi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 据美国广播公司（ABC News）报道，南卡罗来纳州前州长尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）预计将在周日赢得华盛顿特区共和党初选，这是她首次在初选中战胜前总统唐纳德-特朗普。
item.description:
BREAKING: Former South Carolina Gov. Nikki Haley is projected to win Washington, D.C.'s Republican primary on Sunday, ABC News reports, her first primary win over former President Donald Trump.https://t.co/ROR3sVAd1h pic.twitter.com/YAbbEIXBLC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 新的数据显示，南非的犀牛偷猎活动呈上升趋势，去年该地区有近 500 头犀牛被猎杀。
item.description:
Rhino poaching are on the rise in South Africa, as nearly 500 rhinos were killed in the area last year, new figures show. https://t.co/0OgDXuhDZt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 自里约热内卢在登革热爆发后宣布进入公共卫生紧急状态以来，该市已加强了检测能力，开设了十几家登革热医疗中心，并对医务人员进行了培训，以满足不断增长的人口需求。
item.description:
Since Rio de Janeiro declared a public health emergency after an outbreak of dengue fever, the city has ramped up testing capacities, opened up a dozen dengue health centers and trained medical staff to attend to the ever-growing needs of its population. https://t.co/tM91VC7tjM

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 虽然总统提名竞选可能已经接近尾声，但下选区初选季将在超级星期二正式拉开帷幕，这是总统选举年初选日程中最繁忙的一天。以下是值得关注的 12 场超级星期二初选：
item.description:
While the presidential nomination race may be winding down, downballot primary season is officially kicking off on Super Tuesday, the busiest day of the primary calendar in presidential election years.

Here are 12 Super Tuesday primaries to watch: https://t.co/Eous4ms6wC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 根据华盛顿特区共和党的初选结果，@ABC 新闻报道尼基-黑利将赢得华盛顿特区共和党党内初选。
item.description:
BREAKING: Based upon results from the DC Republican Party, @ABC News reports Nikki Haley will win Washington, D.C.'s GOP party-run primary. https://t.co/715F8O14ME

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 根据美国疾病预防控制中心的新指南，COVID-19 的康复者在症状结束后的五天内不再需要保持隔离。
item.description:
People who are recovering from COVID-19 no longer need to remain isolated for five days after symptoms end, according to new CDC guidance. https://t.co/jxHNVbx7hU

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 美国国家运输安全委员会（NTSB）表示，该机构正在调查周六发生的涉及三辆诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern）列车的碰撞和脱轨事故。
item.description:
The NTSB is investigating a collision and derailment involving three Norfolk Southern trains on Saturday, the agency said. https://t.co/MctavvZZaS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 美国食品及药物管理局宣布，某些含有全氟和多氟烷基物质（或称 PFAS）的防油脂材料 "在美国不再出售用于食品包装"。
item.description:
Certain grease-proofing materials containing per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances, or PFAS, "are no longer being sold for use in food packaging in the U.S," the FDA announced. https://t.co/HQprr0FK8P

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 国会领导人发布六项支出法案，努力避免政府部分停摆。
item.description:
Congressional leaders release six spending bills in an effort to avoid a partial government shutdown. https://t.co/vWFvTw0re1

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 您将在哪里观看 4 月 8 日的日全食？还有几周时间，您就可以从陆地、海上或空中选择您的地点，观看日全食。
item.description:
Where will you be watching the April 8 total solar eclipse? There are just a few weeks left to pick your spot to see the skies darken along a strip of North America, whether by land, sea or air. https://t.co/8z2bpDfm19

item.title: 上个月，一名男子在澳大利亚试图抢劫一家酒类专卖店后被捕。监控录像显示，嫌疑人威胁店主并试图偷走收银机，随后附近的旁观者上前制止了他。
item.description:
A man was arrested after he attempted to rob a liquor store in Australia last month.

Surveillance footage shows the suspect threatening the shopkeeper and trying to steal the cash register before nearby bystanders stepped in to stop him. pic.twitter.com/08AXYIIxgP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 在纪念阿拉巴马州塞尔玛 "血色星期天 "59 周年之际，副总统哈里斯说，加沙 "巨大的苦难规模 "要求 "至少在未来六周内 "暂时停火。
item.description:
While commemorating the 59th anniversary of "Bloody Sunday" in Selma, Alabama, Vice Pres. Harris said the "immense scale of suffering" in Gaza demands a temporary cease-fire "for at least the next six weeks." https://t.co/9WmsadaXsr pic.twitter.com/1DnJADLVw4

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 美国首都的樱花季即将到来，现在市民和游客都可以在日历上记下樱花盛开的时间了：
item.description:
Cherry blossom season is almost here in the nation's capital and now residents and tourists alike can mark their calendars for peak bloom.

item.title: 特拉华州威尔明顿汉比小学的一名一年级教师正在将学生与寄养的小狗联系起来，这一举措也在鼓励孩子们阅读。
item.description:
A first grade teacher at Hanby Elementary School in Wilmington, Delaware, is connecting students with foster puppies, an initiative that is also encouraging kids to read. https://t.co/uBaDXnhHLf

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 在举家准备出发去春游的时候，一段关于一名妇女在飞机上争夺窗帘的新视频引发了关于旅客舒适度和礼貌的新问题。
item.description:
As families get set to take off for spring break, a new video of a woman battling over a window shade on a plane has sparked a new question about comfort and courtesy for travelers. https://t.co/VOaphTA2TL

item.title: 电影院一直在寻找一部经典之作，而《沙丘》正在兑现它的承诺：沙丘：第二部》兑现了承诺。
item.description:

item.title: 周五，一场大的冬季风暴袭击了加利福尼亚州马德拉县弗雷斯诺市北部，一场龙卷风被证实袭击了弗雷斯诺市北部。没有人员伤亡的报告。
item.description:
A confirmed tornado hit north of Fresno in Madera County, California, on Friday as a major winter storm hit the state.

The tornado snapped some trees and caused damage to an elementary school. No injuries were reported. https://t.co/r0SXNCp9mX pic.twitter.com/ag0cU9VVWT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 对于那些在 Chick-fil-A 点餐时多蘸了一杯酸甜可口的波利尼西亚酱的人来说，由于潜在的过敏原问题，现在是时候扔掉这种单份调味品了。
item.description:
For anyone who's saved an extra dipping cup of the sweet and sour Polynesian sauce from a Chick-fil-A order, it's time to toss out the single-serving condiment due to potential allergen concerns. https://t.co/XKpDmPldtb pic.twitter.com/ftTHH72PlO

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 召回警报：据美国监管机构称，乔氏超市（Trader Joe's）销售的61,000多磅蒸鸡汤饺因可能含有硬塑料而被召回。
item.description:
RECALL ALERT: More than 61,000 pounds of steamed chicken soup dumplings sold at Trader Joe’s are being recalled for possibly containing hard plastic, according to U.S. regulators. https://t.co/F5yROLLV1b

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯无人机袭击摧毁了南部港口城市敖德萨的一栋公寓楼，造成至少 11 人死亡，其中包括一名抱着婴儿的年轻妇女，泽连斯基总统敦促西方盟国加强乌克兰的防空能力。
item.description:
President Zelenskyy urged Western allies to boost Ukraine’s air defenses after a Russian drone strike destroyed an apartment block in the southern port city of Odesa and killed at least 11 people, including a young woman clutching an infant. https://t.co/HhuuoDuTtg

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 根据发布的一份行政备忘录，佛罗里达大学已取消了该校所有的多元化、公平与包容（DEI）职位。
item.description:
The University of Florida has eliminated all diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) positions at the university, according to an administrative memo released. https://t.co/4LW3aK51MC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 克莱斯勒正在召回 33 万多辆吉普大切诺基，因为方向盘问题可能导致驾驶员失去对车辆的控制。
item.description:
Chrysler is recalling more than 330,000 Jeep Grand Cherokees because of a steering wheel issue that may cause drivers to lose control of their vehicles. https://t.co/H5Rul1xli5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 无论纳税人喜欢与否，今年等待他们的变化包括更新的税级、新的税收抵免以及免费申报资格的扩大。
item.description:
Updated tax brackets, new tax credits and expanded eligibility for free filing are among the changes that await taxpayers this year — whether they like it or not.

Here's what’s new for taxpayers in 2024. https://t.co/p6PKPmtEHM pic.twitter.com/U5psfUQIzL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 爱荷华大学球星凯特琳-克拉克（Caitlin Clark）打破了美国大学生篮球联赛（NCAA）历史得分纪录，成为她职业生涯的又一里程碑。
item.description:
University of Iowa star Caitlin Clark has reached another milestone in her career, breaking the NCAA all-time scoring record.

The 22-year-old surpassed "Pistol" Pete Maravich and now holds the record in both men's and women's Division I basketball. https://t.co/qF2fs10aaW pic.twitter.com/F5jVannMHY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 生日快乐女演员杰西卡-贝尔今天 42 岁了。

HAPPY BIRTHDAY: Actress Jessica Biel turns 42 today. https://t.co/wKOK4ZKG68 pic.twitter.com/3UVm04giP3

item.title: 尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）对如果她在共和党初选中输给特朗普，她是否会兑现支持共和党总统提名人的忠诚承诺表示怀疑："如果你说要背书，那你说的就是输。我不这么认为"。
item.description:
Nikki Haley hedged on whether she'll make good on her loyalty pledge to support the Republican presidential nominee if she loses the GOP primary to Trump: "If you talk about an endorsement, you're talking about a loss. I don't think like that." https://t.co/o2VPBVH8aK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 美国首次开始向加沙空投粮食援助--38,000 多份即食餐，以缓解 200 多万人日益严峻的处境。@TSoufiBurridge在此报道：
item.description:
For the first time, the U.S. began airdropping food aid into Gaza — more than 38,000 ready-to-eat meals to try and alleviate the increasingly dire situation for over 2 million people. @TSoufiBurridge reports.

More here: https://t.co/AF73QEiTUB pic.twitter.com/UHdmv6iGwd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024

item.title: 据消息人士称，联邦调查局将对渔民在阿拉斯加海岸发现的气球碎片进行检查。
item.description:
The FBI will examine what may be debris from a balloon found by fishermen off the coast of Alaska, sources say. https://t.co/Smeivksy7l

— ABC News (@ABC) March 3, 2024
